triples.evidence: Plot the transmitted frequency spectrum of an ultrasound beam from a transducer operating at a central frequency of 1.5 MHz.
A layer of material with an acoustic impedance Z_ML is placed between the transducer and the skin.

If the acoustic impedance of the skin is denoted by Z_S and that of the transducer crystal is denoted by Z_C, show mathematically that the value of Z_ML that minimizes the energy of the reflected wave is given by Z_ML = √(Z_C Z_S).
